attributes.action: To introduce a cap on all migration in to the UK including EU citizens
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see a cap on all migration in the the UK including EU citizens please.

Included in this I would like our Home Office to clear up all the boarder agency and remove all illegal's sending them back to their country of origin and stop with immediate effect all asylum claims in to the UK.

Our country is full, our Benefits and National Health systems are at breaking point and I want the government to do something about this as soon as possible.

If you agree, please sign my petition.
